```{r}
a = 0.07; b = 0.05; c = 1; d = 0.20; u = 15; t = 100

(r = a * u + t * b)

(g = c * u + d * t)

(v = r * a + g * b)

(x = r * c + g * d)

(s = v * a + x * b)

( e = v * c + x * d)

(w = s * a + e * b)

(q = s * c + e * d)

(m = w * a + q * b)

(n = w * c + q * d)

```

```{r}
mat <- c(0.07,.05,1,.2) # creating a vector
mat <- matrix(mat,nrow=2, ncol=2, byrow = TRUE) # creating a matrix with 2 rows and 2 columns
mat
(s = solve(mat) %*% mat) # identify matrix

(a = solve(s - mat)) # inverse matrix

do = c(15, 0, 0, 100)
(d = matrix(do, nrow = 2, ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE))
(f = solve(d) %*% d) # identity matrix 

v = matrix(c(10,18), nrow = 1, ncol = 2, byrow = TRUE)
v
(now =  v %*% a)

(now %*% d) 

sum(now %*% d)
```

(a %*% s) # matrix multi
